net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.feature

Interface UiFeatureCollapse

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeReadCollapsed, AttributeWriteCollapsed, UiFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UiWidgetCollapsableBorderPanel, UiWidgetCollapsableSection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUiWidgetCollapsableBorderPanel, AbstractUiWidgetCollapsableSection, UiWidgetCollapsableBorderPanelGwt, UiWidgetCollapsableSectionGwt, UiWidgetCollapsableSectionTestImpl

    public interface UiFeatureCollapse
extends UiFeature, AttributeWriteCollapsed
    This is the interface for the features of a collapsable object. It can be collapsed and expanded and allows to add and remove instances of UiHandlerEventCollapse.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCollapseHandler(UiHandlerEventCollapse handler)
      This method adds the given UiHandlerEventCollapse to this object.
      boolean removeCollapseHandle(UiHandlerEventCollapse handler)
      This method removes the given UiHandlerEventCollapse from this object.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeWriteCollapsed

        setCollapsed

      • Methods inherited from interface net.sf.mmm.client.ui.api.attribute.AttributeReadCollapsed

        isCollapsed

    • Method Detail

      • addCollapseHandler

        void addCollapseHandler(UiHandlerEventCollapse handler)
        This method adds the given UiHandlerEventCollapse to this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventCollapse to add.

      • removeCollapseHandle

        boolean removeCollapseHandle(UiHandlerEventCollapse handler)
        This method removes the given UiHandlerEventCollapse from this object.
        Parameters:
        handler - is the UiHandlerEventCollapse to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the handler has been removed successfully, false if it was NOT registered and nothing has changed.
